CreateCashExpenses: Create table IF NOT EXISTS CashExpenses(ItemName Varchar(225),Quantity Int,Amount Decimal,ShopOwnerPhnNumber Varchar(225),CommitteName Varchar(225),SpentBy Varchar(225),TransactionMode Varchar(225),Receipt Varchar(225))
CreateItemUsage: Create table IF NOT EXISTS ItemUsage(ItemName Varchar(225),Quantity Int,Purpose Varchar(225),SpentBy Varchar(225)),CommitteName Varchar(225)
getTotalcashexpensesByCommitte: SELECT CommitteName, SUM(Amount) AS TotalAmount FROM CashExpenses WHERE CommitteName = ? GROUP BY CommitteName
getTotalItemsexpensesByCommitte: SELECT CommitteName, ItemName, SUM(Quantity) AS TotalQuantity FROM ItemUsage WHERE CommitteName = ? GROUP BY CommitteName, ItemName
